Text: Great collection! Thanks. Does anyone have the Time-Life 'The Good Cook Techniques and Recipes' classic collection? It's said to be the best book-based cookery course ever.
Thanks so much for uploading this!  Having moved into much smaller quarters, I had to eliminate many of my cookbooks and now I can enjoy them again!

Thanks for the great collection! Could I recommend a book please?!:

The Hummingbird Bakery Cake Days: Recipes to make every day special [Book] by Tarek Malouf

Thanks

This had a virus in one of the pdf files.

When the pdf opened it tried to connect to a remote desktop related website. Do not download.

GR8 UP
TankX


Demoniod we will surely miss you RIP
